        public java.util.List listAllFilePreservations(User loggedInUser)
                                        throws FaultException
        Lists all file preservation lists associated with the org of the user (identified by the session key).
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The current user
        Returns:
        a list of maps containing the file preservation lists
        Throws:
        FaultException - A FaultException is thrown if: - The sessionKey is invalid

      • create

                  java.lang.String name,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> files)
           throws FaultException
        Creates a new file preservation list.
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The current user
        name - name of the file list to create
        files - list of file names to include
        Returns:
        1 if the creation was successful
        Throws:
        FaultException - A FaultException is thrown if: - The sessionKey is invalid - The name already exists
